entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intel x86 Emulator Accelerator (HAXM installer) r7.6.5 #13553
  • Windows Labels inside frames not wrapping #13552
  • Support for [JSImport] in MAUI Blazor App #13551
  • Weird types appear in Intellisense #13549
  • Missing sourceLocation metadata in assemblies when debug on iOS Platform #13548
  • [Android] SwipeItemView size issues #13547
  • [Feature request] net maui dropdown autocomplete #13545
  • Using TargetName reference in VisualStates in MAUI in C# (NOT Xaml) #13540
  • blazor winform publish #13539
  • Navigation messed up permanently if Shell.Current.GoToAsync() is called in the wrong thread #13538

Closed

  • Adding Xamarin Native library as nuget causing an build error #9373
  • Images not display correctly on WinUI #9379
  • Entry ClearButton not taking color of text/hard to see #13432
    Backlog
  • Program does not start .NET MAUI Tutorial #13286
  • FileSystem.OpenAppPackageFileAsync -- Not on windows! #13533
  • App crashes in release with a specific Android code #12407
  • The Webview does not display PDF #7399
  • MAUI Blazor Windows: InputText not leaveable after mouse click #13541
  • Need the option to modify the visibility of the XAML code-behind class so as to hide it from library consumers #12322
    Backlog
  • MAPS Control not working #13517
  • .NET MAUI iOS can't debug or publish arm-64 without iossimulator-x64 #12323

PullRequests

Created

  • [controls] fix memory leak in `BindableLayout` #13550
  • Replace Shell sans-serif-medium magic string on Android #13544
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/fonts 🅰️

Merged

  • Use the TextColor value to set the ClearButton color on the Entry #13475
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [net7.0] Source Generator Cancellation #13522
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Let the Grid skip * measurements during the first pass if they'll be overwritten later #13523
    area/layout 🔲
  • [iOS] Don't scroll more than the available scrollable space #13415
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎, layout-scrollview
  • Handled x:ClassModifier attribute to set the visibility of rootType #13531
    t/breaking 💥, area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • [net7.0] Have Frame use MinimumHeight/Width for minimums instead of constraints #13524
    area/controls 🎮

Updated

  • Remove "IsPresented/ShouldShowSplitMode" check #13497
    area/FlyoutPage
  • [windows] fix memory leak when `CollectionView.ItemsSource` changes #13530
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • Shell routing and Service registration automation #13402
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [templates] Fix applicationId template option #13509
    area/templates 📄
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13434
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Scroll with the keyboard to not block entries and editors #13499
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, layout-scrollview, keyboard
  • Fix test runner issues around our stubbed windows #13536
    backport/suggested
  • [Windows] Fix Picker alignment issues #13516
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • [Android & iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Removing skip attribute from color validation tests #13266
